title: section 7(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2000 (State Authorities) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2000 (state authorities) order 2023

title: section 7(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act
heading: 2. The following bodies are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (j) of
text_raw:
2. The following bodies are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (j) of 
the definition of “State authority” in section 7(1) of the National Treasury 
Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2000 (No. 39 of 2000): 

(a) 

Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission; 

(b) National Disability Authority. 

The Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth consents 
to the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 April, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 May, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [235] 3
